tasks.title: Morning Briefing
tasks.desc: Daily 7am briefing with tasks, news, snow reports, and 3 suggestions
tasks.notes: Feb 26 (Thu): Weekday briefing. Todoist: 48 tasks, 1 overdue (pay bills - Feb 25), 1 due tomorrow (mtb race reg - Feb 27), 1 due this week (weekly review - Mar 2). Top work priorities: VAI v2, AI Jira bug analyzer, FE quality, latency, reliability, burndown, OKRs/bonus FY27, mgr quality plans, superadmin scoping. News: AI coding 90% speedups on simple tasks (MIT), 50% CEOs say job security depends on AI (WEF), 2026 XC series ramping up, kettlebell 2x/week sufficient. Reddit: XC 2026 schedules, thetagang $250-350/wk premiums, Cursor vs Claude workflows, Seahawks FA 2026. Offered: Jira bug analyzer spec (EOD), weekly review pre-read (Sun), Mar 1 race nutrition plan.
